name: RTCDataChannel.readyState
description: The read-only RTCDataChannel property readyState returns an enum of type RTCDataChannelState which indicates the state of the data channel's underlying data connection.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

The read-only RTCDataChannel property readyState returns an enum of type RTCDataChannelState which indicates the state of the data channel's underlying data connection.
